item.title: Winner - Cyber Security Woman of the Year Award 2020
Finalist for Cyber Security Woman Supporter of the Year Award 2020 by Inteligenca
item.description: Humbled to be enlisted among the finalists for “Cybersecurity Woman Supporter of the Year” along with Noureen Njoroge Noureen Njoroge & Diana Kelley Reference https://leadmind.inteligenca.com/cswy2020/
